clues.question: (Sheena Parveen of NBC 7 in San Diego presents the clue.) At San Diego’s Grant Hotel back in 1970, sci-fi master Ray Bradbury & superhero artist Jack Kirby, greeted the 300 fans who attended the first of these; now, it’s an annual event drawing more than 130,000 each year

finalJeopardy.clue: An aria from this opera says, "Put on your costume & apply make-up to your face. The people pay & they want to laugh"
